artist: Artist: Sascha Scatter; Author: Sascha Scatter; Publisher: Sascha Scatter , Berkeley
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photocopied collage of drawn image and letterpressed text printed on blue wove paper cover; 102 pp.
title: The Collective Unconsious: a collection of dreams from the underground
